sig_info: For each Buff on Angela, her opponent suffers the following:

BLOCKING: Advanced training allows Angela to Parry Non-Contact attacks.
WHEN DAMAGED: For Each 10% Max Health Taken in damage, gain an indefinite Resilience Charge.
When below Max Health, if Angela does not have a Regeneration Buff, she converts 1 Resilience Charge into a Regeneration Buff, healing 50.6 Health over 10 seconds.
INDEFINITE HUNTRESS BUFF - ALWAYS ACTIVE: Angela gains an indefinite Buff based on her current Power Level.
Below 1 Bar: Armor up, granting +685.71 Armor Rating.
Between 1 and 2 Bars: Fury, granting +73.95 Attack Rating.
Between 2 and 3 Bars: Precision, granting +1600 Critical Rating.
3 Bars: Aptitude, increasing the Potency of all Fury, Armor Up and Precision Buffs by 60%.
TEMPORARY HUNTRESS BUFFS - CRITICAL HITS: 100% chance to duplicate the current, indefinite Huntress Buff. This duplicated Buff lasts 15 seconds. A maximum of 1 of each type of Huntress Buff may be duplicated at a time.
HEAVY ATTACKS: This attack receives 1600 additional Critical Rating.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Angela’s terrifying aura inflicts 1 Armor Break Debuff on the opponent for each Buff on Angela, removing an Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by +177.78 for 7 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 5 seconds, granting +73.95 Attack.
This Fury Buff instead lasts 20 seconds if Angela already had a Fury Buff active on herself.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to gain an Armor Up Buff for 5 seconds, granting +685.71 Armor Rating.
This Armor Up Buff instead lasts 20 seconds if Angela already had an Armor Up Buff active on herself.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% Chance to grant an Aptitude Buff, increasing the potency of Armor, Fury, and Precision Buffs by 60% lasting for 5 seconds.
This Aptitude Buff instead lasts 30 seconds if Angela already had a Aptitude Buff active on herself.
Angela’s Attack Rating is increased by +43.5 for each Buff active on her during the attack.

SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 5 seconds, granting +97.75 Attack.
This Fury Buff instead lasts 20 seconds if Angela already had a Fury Buff active on herself.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to gain an Armor Up Buff for 5 seconds, granting +707.14 Armor Rating.
This Armor Up Buff instead lasts 20 seconds if Angela already had an Armor Up Buff active on herself.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% Chance to grant an Aptitude Buff, increasing the potency of Armor, Fury, and Precision Buffs by 60% lasting for 5 seconds.
